Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Allows certain members of a public body to be counted as present for quorum purposes at meetings attended remotely
Summary: Allows members of a public body who cannot physically attend a meeting due to a disability to be counted as present for quorum purposes at meetings attended remotely.
LawCode: Amd ยง103-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to quorum requirements for meetings conducted remotely
